examples.en: This medicine will relieve your pain.
He went to the beach to relieve his stress.
The new policy will relieve the burden on small businesses.
examples.tr: Yeni politika, küçük işletmelerin üzerindeki yükü hafifletecek.

examples.en: She was relieved to hear that he was safe.
The new manager will relieve the old one next week.
examples.tr: Yeni yönetici gelecek hafta eskisinin yerini alacak.

examples.en: We should find a way to alleviate the suffering of the poor.
examples.tr: Fakirlerin çektiği acıyı dindirmenin bir yolunu bulmalıyız.

examples.en: The new government aims to alleviate poverty.
Meditation can alleviate stress and anxiety.
They took measures to alleviate the traffic congestion.
examples.tr: Trafik sıkışıklığını azaltmak için önlemler aldılar.

examples.en: A hot bath can help to alleviate muscle pain.
examples.tr: Sıcak bir banyo, kas ağrısını hafifletmeye yardımcı olabilir.

examples.en: The rebellious teenager refused to follow the rules.
She had a rebellious phase in her youth.
The rebellious group planned to overthrow the government.
His rebellious nature often got him into trouble.
examples.tr: İsyankar doğası onu sık sık belaya sokardı.

examples.en: They were known for their rebellious spirit.
The government decided to abolish the old law.
examples.tr: Hükümet eski yasayı feshetmeye karar verdi.

examples.en: Slavery was officially abolished in the 19th century.
The president has promised to abolish the tax.
Many people are calling to abolish the death penalty.
examples.tr: Birçok insan idam cezasının kaldırılmasını talep ediyor.

examples.en: The organization works to abolish human trafficking.
examples.tr: Organizasyon, insan kaçakçılığını ortadan kaldırmak için çalışıyor.

examples.en: The rain did not cease all day long.
The company will cease operations next month.
examples.tr: Şirket önümüzdeki ay faaliyetlerine son verecek.

examples.en: They agreed to cease fire immediately.
The noise ceased as the train passed by.
He hoped the conflict would cease soon.
We need to mitigate the effects of climate change.
The storm was so strong that nothing could mitigate the damage.
examples.tr: Fırtına o kadar şiddetliydi ki hasarı hiçbir şey hafifletemedi.

examples.en: They took steps to mitigate the risks.
The medicine helped to mitigate her headache.
examples.tr: İlaç, baş ağrısını hafifletmeye yardımcı oldu.

examples.en: Training can help to mitigate the impact of mistakes.
examples.tr: Eğitim, hataların etkisini azaltmaya yardımcı olabilir.

examples.en: The value of the currency began to diminish.
His enthusiasm for the project slowly diminished.
examples.tr: Proje için olan hevesi yavaşça azaldı.

examples.en: The new law aims to diminish the power of the central government.
examples.tr: Yeni yasa, merkezi hükümetin gücünü azaltmayı amaçlıyor.

examples.en: The light from the fire began to diminish.
The supply of natural resources is slowly diminishing.
The doctor's body could no longer resist the infection.
He couldn't resist the temptation of the chocolate cake.
The soldiers were ordered to resist the enemy attack.
She resisted the pressure to change her mind.
examples.tr: Fikrini değiştirmesi için yapılan baskıya direndi.

examples.en: The new material is designed to resist rust and corrosion.
examples.tr: Yeni malzeme pas ve korozyona direnmek için tasarlandı.

examples.en: He defied his parents' wishes and traveled abroad.
examples.tr: Ebeveynlerinin dileklerine karşı geldi ve yurt dışına seyahat etti.

examples.en: The small country defied the larger nation's military threat.
examples.tr: Küçük ülke, büyük ulusun askeri tehdidine karşı koydu.

examples.en: The beautiful garden seemed to defy the harsh weather.
examples.tr: Güzel bahçe, sert hava koşullarına meydan okuyor gibiydi.

examples.en: The students defied the school's strict dress code.
examples.tr: Öğrenciler, okulun katı kıyafet yönetmeliğine karşı geldi.

examples.en: He was known for his courage to defy authority.
The dark clouds threatened to bring rain.
examples.tr: Kara bulutlar yağmur getirmekle tehdit ediyordu.

examples.en: He was arrested for threatening a police officer.
examples.tr: Bir polis memurunu tehdit etmekten tutuklandı.

examples.en: A new disease is threatening the local bird population.
examples.tr: Yeni bir hastalık yerel kuş popülasyonunu tehdit ediyor.

examples.en: The company's existence is threatened by its financial problems.
examples.tr: Şirketin varlığı, finansal sorunları tarafından tehdit ediliyor.

examples.en: He threatened to quit his job if he didn't get a raise.
examples.tr: Zam alamazsa işi bırakmakla tehdit etti.

examples.en: The boss's silence was very intimidating.
He has an intimidating presence in the room.
examples.tr: Odada göz korkutucu bir varlığı var.

examples.en: The large dog was intimidating to the children.
Her reputation was a bit intimidating at first.
examples.tr: İlk başta onun ünü biraz göz korkutucuydu.

examples.en: The huge building seemed intimidating from the street.
It is dangerous to walk alone at night.
He has a dangerous habit of driving too fast.
examples.tr: Çok hızlı araba kullanmak gibi tehlikeli bir alışkanlığı var.

examples.en: The dangerous chemicals must be stored carefully.
The mountain pass is considered dangerous during winter.
examples.tr: Dağ geçidi kışın tehlikeli kabul edilir.

examples.en: A dangerous animal was seen in the forest.
The climbers faced a perilous journey up the mountain.
examples.tr: Dağcılar dağa tırmanırken tehlikeli bir yolculukla karşılaştılar.

examples.en: They had to cross a perilous river to reach the other side.
examples.tr: Diğer tarafa ulaşmak için tehlikeli bir nehri geçmeleri gerekti.

examples.en: The mission was highly perilous, with a low chance of success.
examples.tr: Görev, başarı şansı düşük olan son derece riskliydi.

examples.en: He warned them about the perilous nature of the expedition.
examples.tr: Onları seferin tehlikeli doğası hakkında uyardı.

examples.en: Flying in the storm was a perilous undertaking.
His actions were a deliberate attempt to sabotage the project.
examples.tr: Eylemleri, projeyi sabote etmek için kasıtlı bir girişimdi.

examples.en: She made a deliberate choice to study abroad.
examples.tr: Yurt dışında eğitim almak için bilinçli bir seçim yaptı.

examples.en: The damage was not an accident; it was deliberate.
He speaks in a slow and deliberate manner.
examples.tr: Yavaş ve kasıtlı bir şekilde konuşuyor.

examples.en: The police believe the fire was a deliberate act of arson.
examples.tr: Polis, yangının kasıtlı bir kundaklama eylemi olduğuna inanıyor.

examples.en: It was an intentional foul during the game.
His silence was not accidental; it was intentional.
The company's failure was an intentional act by the owner.
examples.tr: Şirketin iflası, sahibinin kasıtlı bir eylemiydi.

examples.en: Was the mistake intentional or just an oversight?
examples.tr: Hata kasıtlı mıydı yoksa sadece bir gözden kaçırma mı?

examples.en: He claimed the harm was not intentional.
He was full of good intent, but his plan failed.
examples.tr: İyi niyetle doluydu, ama planı başarısız oldu.

examples.en: Her intent was to help, but she only made things worse.
examples.tr: Amacı yardım etmekti, ama işleri daha da kötüleştirdi.

examples.en: He was arrested with the intent to steal the car.
The law is clear about the intent behind the action.
examples.tr: Yasa, eylemin arkasındaki niyet hakkında net.

examples.en: The company's intent is to expand into new markets.
We saw a bizarre sight in the sky.
The artist is known for his bizarre sculptures.
He told a bizarre story about his encounter with an alien.
examples.tr: Bir uzaylıyla karşılaşması hakkında tuhaf bir hikaye anlattı.

examples.en: The movie had a bizarre and unpredictable plot.
examples.tr: Filmin tuhaf ve öngörülemez bir konusu vardı.

examples.en: She wore a bizarre costume to the party.
I heard a strange noise in the other room.
examples.tr: Diğer odadan garip bir ses duydum.

examples.en: It's strange that she didn't call.
He has a strange way of looking at things.
I feel strange today, maybe I'm getting sick.
examples.tr: Bugün garip hissediyorum, sanırım hasta oluyorum.

examples.en: She met a strange man on the bus.
He has some odd habits.
It's an odd number, not even.
The house was decorated in a very odd way.
examples.tr: Ev çok tuhaf bir şekilde dekore edilmişti.

examples.en: I got an odd feeling that something was wrong.
examples.tr: Bir şeylerin yanlış olduğuna dair garip bir hissim vardı.

examples.en: The design seemed a bit odd to me.
That's a weird coincidence.
He's wearing a weird combination of clothes.
The ending of the movie was really weird.
I had a weird dream last night.
examples.tr: Dün gece tuhaf bir rüya gördüm.

examples.en: It's weird that the store is closed on a Monday.
examples.tr: Mağazanın pazartesi günü kapalı olması tuhaf.

examples.en: It's a trivial matter that doesn't require our attention.
examples.tr: Bu, dikkatimizi gerektirmeyen önemsiz bir mesele.

examples.en: He always complains about trivial things.
examples.tr: Her zaman önemsiz şeyler hakkında şikayet eder.

examples.en: The mistake was trivial and easily corrected.
Don't worry about such a trivial detail.
examples.tr: Böylesine önemsiz bir detay için endişelenme.

examples.en: The cost of the repair was trivial.
The amount of money he lost was insignificant to him.
examples.tr: Kaybettiği para miktarı onun için önemsizdi.

examples.en: The changes were insignificant and made no difference.
examples.tr: Değişiklikler önemsizdi ve hiçbir fark yaratmadı.

examples.en: He felt insignificant in the large crowd.
His role in the project was insignificant.
The town was an insignificant village.
She suffered a minor injury.

It's a minor issue, but we should fix it.
He made a few minor changes to the plan.
His opinion is totally unimportant.
It's unimportant what he thinks.
The detail seems unimportant, but it might be a clue.
examples.tr: Detay önemsiz görünüyor, ama bir ipucu olabilir.

examples.en: They argued over an unimportant matter.
His feelings were unimportant to her.

The cost of the repair was negligible.
His contribution to the project was negligible.
The risk of infection is negligible.
Her salary increase was so small it was almost negligible.
examples.tr: Maaş artışı o kadar küçüktü ki neredeyse önemsizdi.

examples.en: She is a very efficient worker.

An efficient use of time is crucial.
The company needs to find a more efficient way to produce goods.

examples.en: The efficient organization of the team led to success.
examples.tr: Ekibin verimli organizasyonu başarıya yol açtı.

examples.en: The new drug is highly effective.
The marketing strategy was very effective.
We need to find an effective solution.

examples.en: The new policy proved to be highly effective in reducing crime.
examples.tr: Yeni politikanın suçu azaltmada son derece etkili olduğu kanıtlandı.

examples.en: We had a very productive meeting.

examples.en: Spending time outdoors can make you feel more productive.
examples.tr: Dışarıda vakit geçirmek sizi daha üretken hissettirebilir.

examples.en: The soil in this area is very productive.
A good manager knows how to create a productive work environment.

examples.en: He is a competent teacher.
She is a competent swimmer and can handle the waves.
examples.tr: O, yetenekli bir yüzücü ve dalgalarla başa çıkabilir.

examples.en: The company is looking for a competent manager.
Are you competent to make that decision?
examples.tr: Bu kararı vermek için yeterli misin?

examples.en: He is a highly competent professional.
examples.tr: O, son derece yetkin bir profesyonel.

examples.en: He was able to attain his goal.
We must work hard to attain our objectives.
She hopes to attain a high level of proficiency in French.
examples.tr: Fransızcada yüksek bir yeterlilik seviyesine ulaşmayı umuyor.

examples.en: It's difficult to attain peace in the region.

examples.tr: Pasaport almak için bir izne ihtiyacınız var.

examples.en: She obtained a scholarship to study abroad.
examples.tr: Yurt dışında okumak için bir burs edindi.

examples.en: The police obtained a search warrant.

examples.tr: Şirket yeni bir fabrika inşa etmek için izin aldı.

examples.en: The company is gaining market share.
He gained a lot of experience from his previous job.
examples.tr: Önceki işinden çok fazla deneyim kazandı.

examples.en: You have nothing to lose, but everything to gain.
examples.tr: Kaybedecek hiçbir şeyin yok, ama kazanacak her şeyin var.

examples.en: She gained a lot of weight over the holidays.
The army gained control of the city.

examples.tr: Yıkıcı bir yangın tüm ormanı yok etti.

examples.en: She received a devastating blow to her career.
The storm had a devastating effect on the crops.
examples.tr: Fırtınanın mahsuller üzerinde yıkıcı bir etkisi oldu.

examples.en: His words were very destructive to her self-esteem.

examples.en: He has a very destructive personality.

examples.tr: Kasırga arkasında yıkıcı hasar izleri bıraktı.

examples.en: The project was a destructive force on the environment.
examples.tr: Proje, çevre üzerinde yıkıcı bir güçtü.

examples.en: The failure of the bridge was catastrophic.

examples.tr: Bölgeyi felaket getiren bir deprem vurdu.

examples.en: The loss of his job was a catastrophic event in his life.
examples.tr: İşini kaybetmesi, hayatında felaket getiren bir olaydı.

examples.en: A catastrophic flood destroyed the entire town.
examples.tr: Felaket getiren bir sel, tüm kasabayı yok etti.

examples.en: The company faces a catastrophic financial crisis.
examples.tr: Şirket, felaket getiren bir mali krizle karşı karşıya.

examples.en: A ruinous debt can destroy a person's life.
examples.tr: Yıkıcı bir borç, bir insanın hayatını mahvedebilir.

examples.en: The war had a ruinous effect on the country's economy.
examples.tr: Savaşın ülkenin ekonomisi üzerinde yıkıcı bir etkisi oldu.

examples.en: His gambling habit proved to be ruinous.
They made a ruinous investment.
The long drought had a ruinous effect on the crops.
examples.tr: Uzun süren kuraklığın mahsuller üzerinde yıkıcı bir etkisi oldu.

examples.en: We have an even number of men and women.
examples.tr: Eşit sayıda erkek ve kadınımız var.

examples.en: The score is now even at 2-2.
The chances of winning are even.
The new furniture made the room look even more beautiful.
examples.tr: Yeni mobilya, odayı daha da güzel gösterdi.

examples.en: You should divide the pie into even pieces.
All citizens have equal rights.
The two teams are equal in skill.
examples.tr: İki takım da beceri açısından eşit.

examples.en: He treats all his students as equals.
Ten and ten is equal to twenty.
We need to ensure equal access to education.
There is a great disparity between the rich and the poor.
examples.tr: Zenginler ve fakirler arasında büyük bir eşitsizlik var.

examples.en: The disparity in wages is a serious problem.

examples.tr: Rapor, sağlık hizmetlerine erişimdeki eşitsizliği vurguluyor.

examples.en: We are working to reduce the disparity between urban and rural areas.
examples.tr: Kentsel ve kırsal alanlar arasındaki eşitsizliği azaltmak için çalışıyoruz.

examples.en: The economic disparity in the country is a major concern.
examples.tr: Ülkedeki ekonomik eşitsizlik büyük bir endişe kaynağı.

examples.en: He has an irregular heartbeat.
His visits to his parents were irregular.
The building has an irregular shape.
The team's performance has been very irregular.
The doctor noted an irregular pattern in her breathing.
examples.tr: Doktor, nefes alışında düzensiz bir örüntü fark etti.

examples.en: The surface of the road is uneven.
The table is uneven, so the glass keeps sliding off.
examples.tr: Masa düzensiz, bu yüzden bardak sürekli kayıyor.

examples.en: The ground was uneven and difficult to walk on.
examples.tr: Zemin düzensizdi ve üzerinde yürümek zordu.

examples.en: The distribution of wealth is very uneven.
The cake came out of the oven with an uneven surface.
examples.tr: Pasta, fırından düzensiz bir yüzeyle çıktı.

examples.en: Her story was inconsistent with the facts.
His performance at work has been inconsistent lately.
examples.tr: İş performansı son zamanlarda tutarsız oldu.

examples.en: The rules are inconsistent and confusing.
He gave an inconsistent account of the event.
examples.tr: Olay hakkında tutarsız bir açıklama yaptı.

examples.en: The witness's testimony was inconsistent.

examples.tr: Uzaktan ara sıra silah sesleri duyulabiliyordu.

examples.en: His attendance at school was sporadic.

examples.tr: Uzak bölgeden sadece ara sıra raporlar alıyoruz.

examples.en: The rain was sporadic throughout the day.
examples.tr: Yağmur gün boyunca ara sıra yağıyordu.

examples.en: She had a few sporadic moments of happiness.
His comments were completely irrelevant to the discussion.
The information you provided is irrelevant.
Why are you asking such an irrelevant question?
examples.tr: Neden böylesine alakasız bir soru soruyorsun?

examples.en: Her point was irrelevant to the main argument.
examples.tr: Onun söylediği şey ana argümanla alakasızdı.

examples.en: The details are irrelevant to the big picture.
These two events are completely unrelated.
The two crimes are unrelated.
His actions were unrelated to the company's success.
The two friends are completely unrelated to each other.
examples.tr: İki arkadaş da birbiriyle tamamen alakasız.

examples.en: He told a series of unrelated stories.
The two parts of the story are unconnected.
The different events seemed to be unconnected.

The two files are unconnected in the system.
The detective found a series of unconnected clues.
examples.tr: Dedektif, bir dizi bağlantısız ipucu buldu.

examples.en: It was an inevitable consequence of her actions.
examples.tr: Bu, onun eylemlerinin kaçınılmaz bir sonucuydu.

examples.en: Change is inevitable.

He accepted his inevitable defeat.
The decline of the empire was inevitable.

The rising cost of living is unavoidable.
Paying taxes is an unavoidable part of life.
examples.tr: Vergi ödemek, hayatın kaçınılmaz bir parçası.

examples.en: There was an unavoidable delay in our flight.
An unavoidable conflict arose between them.
It is a certain fact that the sun will rise tomorrow.
examples.tr: Yarın güneşin doğacağı kesin bir gerçek.

examples.en: I am not certain about his plans.
A certain amount of risk is involved.
examples.tr: Belli bir miktar risk söz konusu.

examples.en: It's not certain whether they will win.
The rules are not certain yet.
The threat of war felt inescapable.
The truth was inescapable.
He felt an inescapable sense of doom.
The conclusion was inescapable.
She had to face the inescapable consequences of her actions.

examples.en: The evidence is undeniable.
He has an undeniable talent for music.
examples.tr: Müzik için inkar edilemez bir yeteneği var.

examples.en: It is an undeniable fact that the climate is changing.
examples.tr: İklimin değiştiği inkar edilemez bir gerçek.

examples.en: His success is undeniable.

His argument was irrefutable.
The evidence was irrefutable.
The proof of his guilt was irrefutable.
He presented irrefutable evidence in court.
Her logic was irrefutable.
His loyalty is unquestionable.
He has an unquestionable authority.
The quality of the product is unquestionable.
His influence on the team is unquestionable.
It is an unquestionable fact that he is a good leader.
examples.tr: İyi bir lider olduğu tartışılmaz bir gerçek.

examples.en: It was evident that she was unhappy.

examples.en: She has a permanent job now.

examples.en: This is a permanent solution to the problem.

examples.en: The loss of life was an irreparable tragedy.

examples.en: Our plans depend on the weather.

examples.en: The success of the project will depend on our team's effort.

examples.en: The price depends on the size of the product.

examples.en: You can count on me; I'll be there.

examples.en: She has a very manageable hairstyle.

examples.en: The workload is manageable if you organize your time.

examples.en: The spread of the disease is a controllable threat.

examples.en: The car's speed is easily controllable.

This plan is not feasible.
It's not feasible to travel so far in a single day.
examples.tr: Tek bir günde o kadar uzağa seyahat etmek mümkün değil.

examples.en: We need a feasible solution to the problem.
examples.tr: Soruna uygulanabilir bir çözüm bulmamız gerekiyor.

examples.en: The project seemed feasible at first.
Is it a feasible idea to open a new restaurant?
examples.tr: Yeni bir restoran açmak uygulanabilir bir fikir mi?

examples.en: He was punished with a severe penalty.
The storm caused severe damage to the coast.
examples.tr: Fırtına, sahil şeridinde şiddetli hasara neden oldu.

examples.en: She is suffering from a severe headache.
The judge gave him a severe sentence.
examples.tr: Yargıç ona ağır bir ceza verdi.

examples.en: His illness is more severe than we thought.
The teacher gave them a harsh lecture.
examples.tr: Öğretmen onlara sert bir ders verdi.

examples.en: They had to endure the harsh winter conditions.
examples.tr: Sert kış koşullarına katlanmak zorunda kaldılar.

examples.en: His criticism was too harsh.
The desert is a harsh environment.
She was given a harsh punishment for her mistake.
examples.tr: Hatası için sert bir ceza aldı.

examples.en: Her friendship is very precious to me.
examples.tr: Onun arkadaşlığı benim için çok değerli.

examples.en: Precious memories filled his mind.
This is a precious family heirloom.
Don't waste precious time on unimportant things.
He held the precious jewel in his hands.
This is a very valuable painting.
Her advice was very valuable to me.
The company has some valuable assets.
Time is a valuable resource.
He gained valuable experience from the trip.
He kept the letter as a cherished memory.
examples.tr: Mektubu değerli bir anı olarak sakladı.

examples.en: She cherished every moment she spent with her grandchildren.
examples.tr: Torunlarıyla geçirdiği her anı kıymetli sayıyordu.

examples.en: The ring was a cherished family heirloom.
His cherished dream was to become an astronaut.
She cherished his friendship above all else.
examples.tr: Onun arkadaşlığını her şeyin üstünde tutuyordu.

examples.en: The old book was a treasured possession.
She treasured the memory of her grandfather.
The letter was one of her most treasured possessions.
He kept the coin as a treasured souvenir.
examples.tr: Parayı kıymetli bir hatıra olarak sakladı.

examples.en: The treasured family recipes were passed down through generations.
examples.tr: Kıymetli aile tarifleri nesilden nesile aktarılıyordu.

examples.en: He is a frequent visitor to our home.
examples.tr: Evimize sık sık gelen bir misafir.

examples.en: Frequent headaches can be a sign of stress.
examples.tr: Sık sık baş ağrıları stresin bir işareti olabilir.

examples.en: She makes frequent calls to her family abroad.
The bus service is frequent in this area.
He makes frequent mistakes.
Flu is a common illness in winter.
It is common knowledge that he is a good musician.
examples.tr: İyi bir müzisyen olduğu yaygın bir bilgidir.

examples.en: The bird is very common in this region.
examples.tr: Bu kuş bu bölgede çok yaygın.

examples.en: That is a common problem among teenagers.
examples.tr: Bu, gençler arasında yaygın bir sorun.

examples.en: They have many common interests.
She made repeated attempts to contact him.
examples.tr: Onunla defalarca kez iletişim kurmaya çalıştı.

examples.en: The test requires a series of repeated trials.
examples.tr: Test, bir dizi tekrarlanan deneme gerektiriyor.

examples.en: His repeated lies made it difficult to trust him.
The alarm made a loud, repeated sound.
examples.tr: Alarm, yüksek, tekrarlanan bir ses çıkardı.

examples.en: We must avoid repeated mistakes.
It was his habitual morning routine.
He has a habitual way of scratching his head when he is nervous.
examples.tr: Gergin olduğunda kafasını kaşıma gibi alışkanlık haline gelmiş bir yolu var.

examples.en: The criminal was a habitual liar.
examples.tr: Suçlu alışkanlık haline getirmiş bir yalancıydı.

examples.en: His habitual lateness was a problem for the team.
examples.tr: Alışkanlık haline getirdiği geç kalmaları, takım için bir sorundu.

examples.en: The habitual use of the phrase became annoying.
examples.tr: İfadenin alışılmış kullanımı sinir bozucu olmaya başladı.

examples.en: The presence of the virus was not detectable.
The smell of gas was barely detectable.
The change in his voice was barely detectable.
examples.tr: Sesindeki değişiklik zar zor fark ediliyordu.

examples.en: The planet's movement is not detectable with the naked eye.
The problem is not easily detectable.
The difference between the two colors is noticeable.
examples.tr: İki renk arasındaki fark fark edilebilir.

examples.en: There was a noticeable change in his attitude.
examples.tr: Tutumunda fark edilebilir bir değişiklik vardı.

examples.en: The lack of rain has had a noticeable effect on the crops.
examples.tr: Yağmur eksikliği, mahsuller üzerinde fark edilebilir bir etki yarattı.

examples.en: His progress in English is very noticeable.
There was a noticeable silence after his speech.
examples.tr: Konuşmasından sonra fark edilebilir bir sessizlik vardı.

examples.en: His behavior was not observable to the public.
The effects of the medicine were not immediately observable.
The stars are not observable from the city.
Her reaction to the news was observable to everyone.
The planet's orbit is observable with a telescope.
The suspect was clearly identifiable in the video.
examples.tr: Şüpheli videoda net bir şekilde tanımlanabiliyordu.

examples.en: The remains were not easily identifiable.
The building is easily identifiable by its unique shape.
examples.tr: Bina, eşsiz şekli sayesinde kolayca tanımlanabilir.

examples.en: He has an identifiable style of writing.
The voice on the phone was not identifiable.
Her determination helped her succeed.
He showed great determination to finish the race.
examples.tr: Yarışı bitirmek için büyük bir kararlılık gösterdi.

examples.en: The team's determination to win was evident.
His determination never wavered.
She faced the challenge with a lot of determination.
examples.tr: Meydan okumayla büyük bir azimle yüzleşti.

examples.en: He showed great courage in the face of danger.
It takes courage to admit you were wrong.
She had the courage to speak up against injustice.
He is a man of great courage.
examples.tr: O, büyük cesaret sahibi bir adam.

examples.en: The soldiers fought with courage.
She was resolute in her decision.
He has a resolute desire to succeed.
examples.tr: Başarılı olmak için kararlı bir arzusu var.

examples.en: The team remained resolute despite the setbacks.
He spoke with a resolute voice.
The government is resolute in its fight against corruption.
This tradition has been passed down for generations.
The old stories were passed down orally.
The family recipe was passed down from mother to daughter.
He passed down his knowledge to his students.
The values were passed down through the family.
examples.tr: Değerler aile aracılığıyla nesilden nesile aktarıldı.

examples.en: The radio transmits signals over a long distance.
examples.tr: Radyo, sinyalleri uzun bir mesafeye gönderir.

examples.en: The virus can be transmitted through contact.
The information was transmitted via satellite.
Parents transmit their values to their children.
The disease is transmitted by mosquitoes.
Firefighters quickly put out the fire.
The company will put out a press release tomorrow.
examples.tr: Şirket yarın bir basın bülteni yayımlayacak.

examples.en: Don't put out the candle yet.
He was asked to put out his cigarette.
The government will put out a new report on the economy.
examples.tr: Hükümet, ekonomi hakkında yeni bir rapor yayımlayacak.

examples.en: They didn't have a plan and ended up getting lost.
examples.tr: Bir planları yoktu ve sonunda kayboldular.

examples.en: If you keep practicing, you will end up being a great musician.
examples.tr: Pratik yapmaya devam edersen, sonunda harika bir müzisyen olursun.

examples.en: He ended up going to bed late.
The long road trip ended up being a great adventure.
examples.tr: Uzun yolculuk sonunda harika bir maceraya dönüştü.

examples.en: She might end up moving to another city.
He put forward a new idea during the meeting.
examples.tr: Toplantıda yeni bir fikir öne sürdü.

examples.en: The committee will put forward a new proposal.
She put forward a strong argument in favor of the plan.
examples.tr: Plan lehine güçlü bir argüman sundu.

examples.en: The candidate put forward a plan for economic reform.
examples.tr: Aday, ekonomik reform için bir plan öne sürdü.

examples.en: He put himself forward as a leader.
She got into trouble for being late.
examples.tr: Geç kaldığı için başı belaya girdi.

examples.en: He wants to get into the film industry.
Don't get into an argument with him.
She got into a new hobby: gardening.
He got into college with a scholarship.
After a few years of traveling, he decided to settle down.
examples.tr: Birkaç yıl seyahat ettikten sonra yerleşmeye karar verdi.

examples.en: The children settled down to listen to the story.
She wants to settle down and start a family.
The dust will settle down in a few minutes.
The noise began to settle down after midnight.
examples.tr: Gürültü gece yarısından sonra azalmaya başladı.

examples.en: The flowers give off a wonderful scent.
The machine gives off a lot of heat.
The fire gives off a warm glow.
The substance gave off a strange odor.
The dying star gives off light and energy.
examples.tr: Ölmekte olan yıldız ışık ve enerji yayıyor.

examples.en: Please carry on with your work.
They carried on the family business.
She carried on singing despite the noise.
examples.tr: Gürültüye rağmen şarkı söylemeye devam etti.

examples.en: The conversation carried on for hours.
He carried on his research in the new lab.
I couldn't make out what he was saying.
Can you make out the sign in the distance?
They were able to make out a figure in the fog.
She couldn't make out the details of the painting.
I can't make out his handwriting.
This campaign aims at reducing waste.
The new law is aimed at improving public health.
examples.tr: Yeni yasa, halk sağlığını iyileştirmeyi hedefliyor.

examples.en: He aimed the gun at the target.
The program is aimed at helping unemployed people.
examples.tr: Program, işsiz insanlara yardım etmeyi amaçlıyor.

examples.en: The project is aimed at solving the problem of pollution.
Don't expose your skin to the sun for too long.
examples.tr: Cildinizi güneşe çok uzun süre maruz bırakmayın.

examples.en: The film will expose the corruption in the government.
Children should not be exposed to violence.
The journalist was exposed to a lot of danger during the war.
examples.tr: Gazeteci, savaş sırasında birçok tehlikeye maruz kaldı.

examples.en: He didn't want to expose his family to any risk.
examples.tr: Ailesini herhangi bir riske maruz bırakmak istemedi.

examples.en: The car broke down on the highway.
The food will break down in the stomach.
His health began to break down under the stress.
We need to break down the problem into smaller parts.
examples.tr: Sorunu daha küçük parçalara ayırmamız gerekiyor.

examples.en: She broke down in tears after hearing the news.
He likened her voice to that of an angel.
The movie was likened to a classic film.
She likened her relationship to a rollercoaster.
He was likened to a great leader.
The writer likened the city to a jungle.
The new policy will relieve the burden on small businesses.
examples.tr: Yeni politika, küçük işletmelerin üzerindeki yükü hafifletecek.

examples.en: He was relieved of his duties.
The tax cuts will relieve the financial pressure on families.
examples.tr: Vergi indirimleri, aileler üzerindeki mali baskıyı hafifletecek.

examples.en: She was relieved of the heavy responsibility.
He relieved her of her suitcase.
The film perpetuates negative stereotypes.
The tradition has been perpetuated for centuries.
He perpetuated the myth about his wealth.
Poverty is often perpetuated by a lack of education.
examples.tr: Yoksulluk genellikle eğitim eksikliğiyle devam ettirilir.

examples.en: The cycle of violence continues to perpetuate itself.
They are working to eradicate the disease.

We must eradicate all forms of discrimination.
It is difficult to eradicate a pest from the garden.
examples.tr: Bahçedeki bir haşereyi yok etmek zordur.

examples.en: The government launched a campaign to eradicate illiteracy.
examples.tr: Hükümet, okuma yazma bilmezliği ortadan kaldırmak için bir kampanya başlattı.

examples.en: After the flood, the city was completely inundated.
examples.tr: Selden sonra şehir tamamen sular altında kaldı.

examples.en: We were inundated with calls after the advertisement aired.
examples.tr: Reklam yayınlandıktan sonra telefon yağmuruna tutulduk.

examples.en: The river will inundate the fields during the rainy season.
examples.tr: Nehir, yağmur mevsiminde tarlaları sular altında bırakacak.

examples.en: The company was inundated with customer complaints.
The celebrity was inundated with messages from fans.
The box contains several different items.
The report contains important information.
The fire was difficult to contain.
She couldn't contain her excitement.
The document contains a list of all employees.
examples.tr: Belge, tüm çalışanların bir listesini içeriyor.

examples.en: He embraced the challenge with a positive attitude.
examples.tr: Pozitif bir tutumla meydan okumayı benimsedi.

examples.en: The couple embraced warmly.
The city has embraced the new technology.
She embraced her old friend after many years.
We must embrace new ideas to progress.
The ancient city perished in a great fire.
examples.tr: Antik şehir büyük bir yangında yok oldu.

examples.en: Many animals perished during the long drought.
examples.tr: Uzun kuraklık sırasında birçok hayvan yok oldu.

examples.en: The documents were left to perish in the basement.
The plant will perish without water.
The hopes of the team perished after the last goal was scored.
examples.tr: Son gol atıldıktan sonra takımın umutları yok oldu.

examples.en: The value of the currency began to diminish.
His enthusiasm for the project slowly diminished.
examples.tr: Proje için olan hevesi yavaşça azaldı.

examples.en: The new law aims to diminish the power of the central government.
examples.tr: Yeni yasa, merkezi hükümetin gücünü azaltmayı amaçlıyor.

examples.en: The light from the fire began to diminish.
The supply of natural resources is slowly diminishing.
The government tried to suppress the protests.
He could not suppress a smile.
The new manager was unable to suppress the rumors.
The military was called in to suppress the rebellion.
She suppressed her anger.
Don't put off doing your homework.
The meeting was put off until next week.
His rude behavior put me off the idea of dating him.
examples.tr: Kaba davranışı, onunla çıkma fikrinden beni soğuttu.

examples.en: I keep putting off going to the dentist.
The bad smell put me off my food.
The game was suspended due to heavy rain.
examples.tr: Şiddetli yağmur nedeniyle maç askıya alındı.

examples.en: He was suspended from school for two weeks.
The company decided to suspend operations.
The lamp was suspended from the ceiling.
His license was suspended for a month.
He was arrested for threatening a police officer.
examples.tr: Bir polis memurunu tehdit etmekten tutuklandı.

examples.en: A new disease is threatening the local bird population.
examples.tr: Yeni bir hastalık yerel kuş popülasyonunu tehdit ediyor.

examples.en: The company's existence is threatened by its financial problems.
examples.tr: Şirketin varlığı, finansal sorunları tarafından tehdit ediliyor.

examples.en: He threatened to quit his job if he didn't get a raise.
examples.tr: Zam alamazsa işi bırakmakla tehdit etti.

examples.en: The clouds threatened rain.
His actions were a deliberate attempt to sabotage the project.
examples.tr: Eylemleri, projeyi sabote etmek için kasıtlı bir girişimdi.

examples.en: She made a deliberate choice to study abroad.
examples.tr: Yurt dışında eğitim almak için bilinçli bir seçim yaptı.

examples.en: The damage was not an accident; it was deliberate.
He speaks in a slow and deliberate manner.
examples.tr: Yavaş ve kasıtlı bir şekilde konuşuyor.

examples.en: The police believe the fire was a deliberate act of arson.
examples.tr: Polis, yangının kasıtlı bir kundaklama eylemi olduğuna inanıyor.

examples.en: That comment is completely irrelevant to the discussion.
The information you provided is irrelevant.
Why are you asking such an irrelevant question?
examples.tr: Neden böylesine alakasız bir soru soruyorsun?

examples.en: Her point was irrelevant to the main argument.
examples.tr: Onun söylediği şey ana argümanla alakasızdı.

examples.en: The details are irrelevant to the big picture.
The witness was found to be unreliable.
His information is completely unreliable.
The old car is unreliable and often breaks down.
examples.tr: Eski araba güvenilmezdir ve sık sık bozulur.

examples.en: He is an unreliable source of information.
The weather forecast is unreliable.
The project is difficult but manageable.

examples.tr: Görev daha küçük, daha yönetilebilir parçalara bölündü.

examples.en: She has a very manageable hairstyle.
examples.tr: Çok kolay yönetilebilir bir saç stili var.

examples.en: The workload is manageable if you organize your time.
We need to find a manageable solution.
The accident was unavoidable.
The rising cost of living is unavoidable.
Paying taxes is an unavoidable part of life.
examples.tr: Vergi ödemek, hayatın kaçınılmaz bir parçası.

examples.en: There was an unavoidable delay in our flight.
An unavoidable conflict arose between them.
The presence of the virus was not detectable.
The smell of gas was barely detectable.
The change in his voice was barely detectable.
examples.tr: Sesindeki değişiklik zar zor fark ediliyordu.

examples.en: The planet's movement is not detectable with the naked eye.
The problem is not easily detectable.
